topic.title: BSG Battlestar Galactica 720p Complete (incl. Caprica) 2003-2012 Extras Subs
topic.body:
*** BSG (2003-2012) - Complete Series ***

This 720p (Caprica: 480p) Complete Series
set includes:

Miniseries, S1, S2, The Resistance Webisodes,
S3, Razor, S4.0, The Face Of The Enemy Webisodes,
S4.1, The Plan, BSG: Blood and Chrome (Prequel
Spin-off), Caprica (Prequel Spin-off Series)

All extended/unrated versions of episodes included.
DVD/Bluray Extras included.
Also Included: Soundtracks (MP3)

File Names ending with '+ C' or '+ 2xC' denote
optional commentaries.

Source Files:

Miniseries.2003.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
S01.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
S02.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
S03.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
Razor.Extended.2007.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
S04.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-REPTiLE
The.Plan.2009.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-quaz
Blood.And.Chrome.2012.720p.BluRay.x264-GECKOS[PublicHD]
Caprica - 2 DVD Box Sets (PAL)
Extras: DVDs (PAL), torrents by wisewortel (BDRips) &
bsg4you

Soft-Coded Subs.: English, French, Spanish (SSA, muxed in)*
English (separate SRTs)

*The Plan, Blood and Chrome and Caprica don't include
French and Spanish.
* Caprica - English (VobSub, muxed in)

FILE INFO:

Containers......: mkv
Video...........: 1280x720 (x264, 16:9)
(Caprica 854x480 (x264, 16:9)
Video Quality...: Constant RF: 24,0
(Caprica RF: 22,0)
Audio...........: Track 1: 2.0 ch. (128 kbps, aac)
Track 2,3: 1.0 ch.
(commentary, 32 kbps, aac)
Frame Rate......: 23,976 fps
(Caprica 25,00 fps)
Extras..........: Included
Samples.........: Included
